title: ISic003464. I.Sicily inscription 003464
body:
Facsimile Images

Iuliae ((·)) Domnae ((·)) Aug(ustae)
matris ((·)) castrorum
Imp(eratoris) ((·)) Caes(aris) ((·)) L(uci) ((·)) Septimi
Severi ((·)) Pertinacis
5Aug(usti) ((·)) coniugi
municipium ((·)) Gaul(itanorum)
p(ecunia) ((·)) p(ublica) ((·)) d(ecreto)
curant[e ---]SI
[---]NO

Apparatus criticus

CIL

English translation

To Iulia Domna Augusta, mother of the camps and wife of Imperator Caesar Lucius Septimius Severus Pertinax. The municipium of Gaulus decreed this from public funds, under the care of [???]

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.7502 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • Bruno 2004 20-21 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002111
  • Pirino 2005 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001389
